title: Complete bs about the mystery skin
body: My friend got fucking snowstorm sivir and red riding annie as well as striker ez with 1 $10 gift card just gifting skins to himself. When i did it i got 2 fucking garen skins (commando and sanguine but i got steel legion as the end of year gift which was also bs) as well as officer caitlyn. I knew that the gifting was bullshit but this is wayyy to bullshit because you cant get those skins at the current time. Fuck riot. Its one thing to get those 1820 skins but to get fucking unavailable skins that riot says is impossible to get... im going back to dota

replies.body:
Mystery skins work on the concept that you're at the mercy of the random number god. Of course there's going to be an instance where someone gets good skins and you don't.

This is what you should expect.
